fields.fieldDescription: The Record ID (RID) of the customer.
"The profile type (e.g. lender, borrower, guarantor, etc.) associated with this location record."
The location code associated with this location record.
The Record ID (RID) that uniquely identifies this location record.
The Taxpayer ID for the customer at this location.
The tax exempt code for the customer at this location.  (Applies only to lender locations).
The date of the first transaction associated with this location.
The date of the last transaction associated with this location.
Indicates whether or not a breakfunding agreement is in effect for the customer at this location.  (Applies only to lender locations).
"Indicates whether or not the customer at this location is a ""watchful account"".  (Applies only to lender locations)."
Timestamp from when this row was created.
Timestamp from when this row was last updated.
User ID that created this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
User ID that last updated this row.  This is a foreign key to VLS_USER_PROFILE.UPT_UID_USERID.
The approved amount of the unfunded risk associated with this location. (Unfunded risk applies only to lender locations.)
The currency associated with the approved and used unfunded risk amounts.
The date on which the unfunded risk for this location is scheduled to be reviewed next.
The date that the unfunded risk was last approved.
Indicates whether or not unfunded risk is associated with this location.  (Unfunded risk applies only to lender locations).
The number of years for which the customer has been approved for unfunded risk at this location.
The Record ID (RID) for the profile associated with this location.
The amount of the unfunded risk that has been used.
Indicates whether or not this location is complete.
Indicates whether or not the customer at this location is a qualified buyer.  (Applies only to lender locations).
The preferred language of the customer at this location.
N/A
N/A
N/A
The Branch Identifier
